title: Galloping Thru
text: Galloping Thru is a 1931 American <a href="Western%20%28genre%29">Western</a> film directed by <a href="Lloyd%20Nosler">Lloyd Nosler</a> and written by <a href="Wellyn%20Totman">Wellyn Totman</a>. The film stars <a href="Tom%20Tyler">Tom Tyler</a>, <a href="Betty%20Mack">Betty Mack</a>, <a href="Alan%20Bridge">Alan Bridge</a>, Si Jenks, <a href="Stanley%20Blystone">Stanley Blystone</a> and <a href="Gordon%20De%20Main">Gordon De Main</a>. The film was released on December 5, 1931, by <a href="Monogram%20Pictures">Monogram Pictures</a>.
